titles.title: Plastic Container Identification Act of 1993

To prohibit the introduction of a plastic container into interstate commerce that does not contain a marking that identifies the type of plastic resin used to produce the container, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Plastic Container Identification Act of 1993 - Requires labeling of plastic containers indicating the plastic resin used to produce the container.
